Summary: While talking on phone to a neighbor, I looked out the window facing east and saw the bright white star shaped light.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Toledo
There was one other sighting in Toledo on or around September 13th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in my recliner talking to my neighbor and a light caught my eye. i turned my head to the left to look out the window(that faces east) and saw a bright star-like object. it looked like the one i saw 9\3. i asked my neighbor to look at it because i didn't have my camera. she lives on the street perpendicular to my home. together we watched the light about 45 degrees in the sky, staying in the same location about 10 minutes. i asked her to tell me what she saw and she said," there is a bright white star with a red rotating light." i couldn't see the red light from my position except for a second. after about ten minutes we saw it move to about 55 degrees in the sky and gradually further away. after about 20 minutes i saw the star like light spread to a small white line and disappear. i learned on the news after observing the object that there was a grainery fire in east toledo.
